job_tasks.phrase: Modellen die voorspellen welke advertentie banner/creative het meest geschikt is voor een online bezoeker
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core task of developing predictive models for ad suitability, which falls under model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor most likely converters/clickers van advertentie campagnes
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct example of building predictive models, a key task in traditional ML.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor het voorspellen van leeftijd en gender van DPG Media online bezoekers obv geconsumeerde content
job_tasks.justification: Another specific instance of developing predictive models based on user content consumption.

job_tasks.phrase: Toevoegen van profile enrichments in batch & real-time flows in een big data environment
job_tasks.justification: This describes data processing and enrichment within data flows, fitting the data engineering category.

job_tasks.phrase: Data pipelines & dashboards voor quality monitoring & alerting
job_tasks.justification: Building data pipelines and monitoring systems is a core data engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: You build it, you run it mentaliteit (development & devops, infra-as-code, CICD, â€¦)
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions DevOps practices like infra-as-code and CI/CD, which are central to MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: This covers the entire model development lifecycle from analysis and experimentation to implementation and presentation.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt mee aan onze onderliggende data stack & data pipelines (python, PySpark, ElasticSearch, Terraform, Airflow,..)
job_tasks.justification: This task involves building data stacks and pipelines using specific tools, which is data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt samen met de Data & ML engineers ons ML Ops platform uit
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions building an ML Ops platform, a key MLOps task.

job_tasks.phrase: Je integreert onze services met andere DPG teams die van onze data services gebruik maken
job_tasks.justification: This describes integrating services with other teams, a core software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Indien gewenst, bouw je mee aan onze web-applicaties (voor interne & externe gebruikers) die onze data-producten ontsluiten
job_tasks.justification: Building web applications that expose data products is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: Presenting results to the business team indicates an understanding of business needs and communication with stakeholders.

job_tasks.phrase: Je versterkt ons scrum team bestaande uit Product Owner, Scrum Master & 8 developers.
job_tasks.justification: Working within a scrum team implies collaboration and communication.

job_tasks.phrase: Je neemt deel aan standups, refinements, retro's & demo's (2-week)
job_tasks.justification: Participation in agile ceremonies is a form of team collaboration and communication.

job_tasks.phrase: je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: Presenting results to both dev and business teams requires communication skills.

job_tasks.phrase: Je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde modellen, jobs & applicaties
job_tasks.justification: Taking ownership and accountability directly maps to the 'Ownership' aspect of this category.

job_tasks.phrase: Daarnaast coach je Machine Learning engineers
job_tasks.justification: Coaching other engineers is a clear indicator of communication and collaboration skills.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on traditional ML tasks such as building predictive models for advertising, analyzing user behavior, and managing data pipelines. While it mentions MLOps and software integration, there is no mention of Generative AI, LLMs, RAG, or related concepts. The tasks are predominantly from Macro-Category B (Model Development & Fine-Tuning, Data Engineering & Management) and Macro-Category A (Software Development & Integration, Operations & MLOps), with a clear emphasis on traditional ML, fitting the 'Core ML Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about the tasks and technologies involved. The responsibilities clearly point towards traditional ML rather than GenAI, making the profile assignment straightforward and highly confident.
